item.title: Hello World Hexo
item.description: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start Create a new post npm install hexo-cli -g hexo init blog cd blog npm install hexo server $ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server $ hexo server More info: Server
